name: Getting Over Work
description:
A pile of unpaid overtime is separating the boss from his workers!
He won't listen unless there
are 30+ dissenters he can see.

Click or press space to drop workers on top of one another.
Stack them tall AND unstable so they fall over the paperwork 
and begin protesting.

~

Controls: space or click

made by perebite

Made for the Organizing at Work Jam:

 https://itch.io/jam/organising-at-work
